tool_description: Cheap and easy to use real time IP reputation, proxy and fraud checking API.
name: ProxyTrust
title: ProxyTrust

api_list.name: Get detailed info about IP
api_list.description: GET endpoint to query various information about an IP, what kind of proxy it is, and IP location.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://proxytrust.p.rapidapi.com/detailed/1.1.1.1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "proxytrust.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://proxytrust.p.rapidapi.com/detailed/{ip}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "proxytrust.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Check if IP is proxy
api_list.description:
Simple GET endpoint to check if the given IP is a known proxy or not.
Returns 1 if the endpoint is a proxy, 0 if not.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://proxytrust.p.rapidapi.com/simple/is_proxy/1.1.1.1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "proxytrust.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Check if IP is nonresidential
api_list.description:
Simple GET endpoint to check if the given IP is a proxy or datacenter IP or not.
Returns 1 if the endpoint is nonresidential, 0 if not.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://proxytrust.p.rapidapi.com/simple/is_nonresidential/1.1.1.1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "proxytrust.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
